posts.name: ScienceMatters
posts.text: COVID vaccines have saved millions of lives. The data proves their effectiveness in preventing severe illness!

posts.name: MyBodyMyChoice
posts.text: Forcing people to take a vaccine is authoritarian. Medical freedom should be a personal choice!

posts.name: LabLeakTheory
posts.text: There’s strong evidence that COVID-19 leaked from a lab in Wuhan. Why isn’t the world holding China accountable?

posts.name: LongCovidSurvivor
posts.text: Long COVID is real and debilitating. More research is needed to help those suffering from it.

posts.name: MaskUp
posts.text: Wearing a mask in crowded places is a simple way to prevent the spread of COVID-19. It’s basic science!

posts.name: ReopenTheEconomy
posts.text: Lockdowns destroyed small businesses and livelihoods. The damage was far worse than the virus itself!

posts.name: FactCheck
posts.text: Social media is filled with COVID misinformation. We need better fact-checking to stop the spread of lies!

posts.name: NaturalImmunity
posts.text: Natural immunity is more effective than vaccines. The government should have focused on protecting the vulnerable instead of mass vaccination.

posts.name: ZeroCovidDebate
posts.text: China’s zero-COVID policy was strict but prevented deaths. Was it a necessary sacrifice or government overreach?

posts.name: StayProtected
posts.text: Booster shots improve immunity and reduce hospitalization rates. Everyone should get theirs!

posts.name: WHOFailure
posts.text: The WHO mishandled COVID-19 from the start. They covered for China and failed the world!

posts.name: KeepSchoolsOpen
posts.text: Closing schools was a huge mistake. Kids suffered more from isolation than from COVID!

posts.name: FalsePositives
posts.text: COVID-19 tests aren’t 100% accurate. How many people were wrongly told they had the virus?

posts.name: NextPandemic
posts.text: We must learn from COVID-19 and improve global preparedness for the next pandemic!

posts.name: MentalHealthMatters
posts.text: The mental health crisis caused by the pandemic needs more attention. Isolation made things worse for many people.

posts.name: OpenBordersNow
posts.text: Travel restrictions were unnecessary and hurt global economies. Countries should never shut down again!

posts.name: FollowTheMoney
posts.text: Pharmaceutical companies made billions from COVID vaccines. Was this really about public health or profit?

posts.name: RemoteWork
posts.text: The pandemic changed work culture forever. Should remote work be the new normal?

posts.name: FreedomMatters
posts.text: Lockdowns, vaccine mandates, and restrictions were a massive government overreach. Never again!

posts.name: LearnFromHistory
posts.text: What are the biggest lessons humanity should learn from COVID-19 to better handle future pandemics?
